Package nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp21.domain

Class Game

java.lang.Object
nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp21.domain.Game
public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
The Game class handles the clock and interacts with the App module. It is static and is initialised in the field of Main to get the game started.
Author:
Victor Tam
